Posts.Content: Feb 28, 2017 05:37PM CourtneyGanus wrote: I can understand very well how it looks the skin after chemo.Becuase In my family member also affected the cancer and recovered after complete few chemo treatments. Posts.Title: Dry skin & wrinkles after chemo? jenlee Dthayer
